author: Simon's Cat
description:
POV you're a kitten getting ready for your first Thanksgiving! Enjoy this cozy compilation as Kitten experiences all the joy of Thanksgiving in full colour episodes. 

🎄 Get festive with this year's limited edition Christmas jumper: https://simonscatmerch.com/en-gbp/products/christmas-jumper 🎄

Get ready to laugh, smile, and feel the warm fuzzies every fortnight with our 'Caturday Film Club'. Tune in every other Sat(Cat)urday at 2pm GMT / 9am EST for your fortnightly dose of Simon's Cat hilarity. Showcasing the best of Simon's Cat, from old classics to films you might not have seen before, helping you ease into the weekend, relaxed and with a smile on your face!

title: A Kitten's Guide to Thanksgiving - Caturday Film Club
